products.name: Anson Durst, Rock of the Faith

characterabilities.name: Brace For Impact
characterabilities.description: This model is not moved when slammed.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Warriors of the Old Faith]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Warriors of the Old Faith armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Retaliatory Strike
characterabilities.description: If a model with Retaliatory Strike is hit by a melee attack made by an enemy model during your opponent's turn, after that attack is resolved the model with Retaliatory Strike can immediately make one basic melee attack against that model. The model with Retaliatory Strike can make only one Retaliatory Strike per turn.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Sturdy
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be pushed.

feat.name: Bastion of Faith
feat.description: While in Anson Durst, Rock of the Faith's Control range, warjacks in his battlegroup gain +4 ARM and Brace for Impact. When a friendly Faction warrior model in Durst's Control range is directly hit by an attack while within 2" of a warjack in Durst's battlegroup, you can choose to have the warjack be directly hit instead. The warjack is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects from the attack. Bastion of Faith lasts for one round.

execution.name: Stone-and-Mortar Stance
execution.description: During its activation, this model can forfeit its Normal Movement or Combat Action to gain +5 ARM. The affected model cannot become knocked down. Stone-and-Mortar Stance lasts for one round.

ability.name: Eruption of Ash
ability.description: If a model is boxed by an attack made with this weapon, center a 3" AOE cloud effect on the boxed model and then remove that model from play. The AOE is a hazard that remains in play for one round. Enemy models in the AOE when it was put in play are hit and suffer a POW 12 fire damage roll. Enemy models entering or ending their activations in the AOE suffer a POW 12 fire damage roll. Eruption of Ash damage rolls cannot be boosted.

spells.name: Bulwark
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, and B2B with one or more models in its battlegroup, models in the spellcaster's battlegroup gain +2 DEF and cannot become knocked down.

spells.name: Cleansing Fire
spells.description: Cleansing Fire causes fire damage. On a critical hit models suffer the Fire Continuous effect.

spells.name: Deceleration
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly faction models gain +2 ARM against ranged and magic attack damage rolls. Deceleration lasts for one round.

spells.name: Defender's Ward
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 DEF and ARM. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Hallowed Avenger
spells.description: Target friendly Faction Cohort model gains Righteous Vengeance. (If one or more friendly Faction warrior models were destroyed or removed from play by enemy attacks while within 5" of a model with Righteous Vengeance during the last round, during your Maintenance Phase the model with Righteous Vengeance can advance up to 3" and make one basic attack.).

characterabilities.name: Heart of Darkness [Protectorate of Menoth]
characterabilities.description: If included in an Infernals army, any non-partisan, non-character Protectorate of Menoth Cohorts can also be included in this model's battlegroup and they gain Accumulator [Soulless]. Additionally, you may include 2 non-partisan, non-character Protectorate of Menoth units and 3 non-partisan, non-Archon, non-character Protectorate of Menoth Solos as well. While this model is in play friendly Soulless models gain Serenity.

characterabilities.name: Whip the Flames
characterabilities.description: Models suffering the Fire continuous effect while in this model's Control range suffer -2 to accuracy rolls.

feat.name: Scorched Earth
feat.description: Enemy models currently in Feora's Control range suffer the Continuous Fire effect. Friendly warjack models can charge or power attack slam enemy models suffering the Continuous Fire effect without spending a focus point. Scorched Earth lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Ashen Veil
execution.description: This model has concealment. Living enemy models without Resistance: Fire suffer -2 to attack accuracy rolls while within 2" of this model.

feat.name: Wildfire
feat.description: Feora gains 1 focus point for each enemy model currently in her Control range suffering the Continuous Fire effect and can immediately give that focus to warjacks in her battlegroup that are in her Control range. Feora can then remove the Continuous Fire effect from any number of models in her Control range. For each Continuous Fire effect Feora removes, choose one model in her Control range to suffer the Continuous Fire effect.

characterabilities.description: This model is not a warcaster or Leader, but has the following warcaster special rules: Battlegroup Controller, Focus Manipulation, Power Field, and Spellcaster. This model must have at least one warjack in its battlegroup at the start of the game.

characterabilities.name: True Sight
characterabilities.description: This model ignores cloud effects when determining LOS. This model also ignores Stealth.

spells.name: Fortify
spells.description: Target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2 ARM. That model and any friendly model B2B with it cannot become knocked down, be pushed, or moved by a slam.

spells.name: Immolation
spells.description: Immolation cases fire damage. On a critical hit, target model suffers the fire continuous effect.

characterabilities.name: Chain Attack [Relic Blade] [Smite]
characterabilities.description: If this model hits the same model with two Relic Blade intial attacks, after resolving the attacks it can immediately Smite. (The target is slammed d6” directly away from this model and suffers a damage roll with POW equal to the STR of this model plus the POW of the weapon. The POW of the collateral damage is equal to the STR of this model.)

characterabilities.name: Inhuman Resolve
characterabilities.description: When a living friendly Faction model in this model's CMD range is destroyed by an enemy attack, after the attack is resolved this model can remove 1 damage point. When this model is disabled, it becomes knocked down instead of becoming boxed and its activation immediately ends. While this model is disabled, it cannot activate. If this model is disabled at the beginning of your maintenance phase, it is destroyed.

characterabilities.name: Righteous Fury
characterabilities.description: When one or more friendly Faction warrior models are destroyed by an enemy attack while in this model's command range, this model gains +2 STR and ARM for one round.

characterabilities.name: Animosity [Morrowan or Thamarite Models]
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be part of an army that includes Morrowan or Thamarite Models.

characterabilities.name: Ashen Veil
characterabilities.description: This model has concealment. Living enemy models without Resistance: Fire suffer -2 to attack accuracy rolls while within 2" of this model.

characterabilities.name: Divine Inspiration
characterabilities.description: This model gains an additional die on melee attack accuracy and damage rolls. Discard the lowest die of each roll.

characterabilities.name: Divine Manifestation
characterabilities.description: This model is not a living model, cannot become knocked down, and never suffers Blind or Shadow Bind. Opponents cannot take Control of this model.

characterabilities.name: Fuel for the Flames [5"]
characterabilities.description: When a model without Resistance: Fire suffers a fire damage roll while within 5" of this model, add +2 to the roll.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Llael]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Llael.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Khador, Protectorate of Menoth]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Khador, Protectorate of Menoth armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Righteous Fury
characterabilities.description: When one or more friendly Faction warrior models are destroyed by an enemy attack while in this model's command range, this model gains +2 STR and ARM for one round.

characterabilities.name: Soul Ward
characterabilities.description: Enemy models cannot gain soul tokens from friendly models destroyed within 5" of this model.

characterabilities.name: Swift Vengeance
characterabilities.description: If one or more friendly warrior models were destroyed or removed from play by enemy attacks while within 5" of this model during your opponent's last turn, during your Maintenance Phase this model can advance 3" and make one basic melee attack.

ability.name: Dispel
ability.description: When this weapon hits a model/unit, upkeep spells and animi on that model/unit immediately expire.

ability.name: Grievous Wounds
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

ability.name: Thresher (★Attack)
ability.description: This model makes one melee attack with this weapon against each model in it's LOS that is in this weapon's melee range. Thresher attacks are simultaneous.

characterabilities.name: Acrobatics
characterabilities.description: This model can advance through other models if it has enough movement to move completely past their bases. This model ignores intervening models when declaring its charge target.

characterabilities.name: Dodge
characterabilities.description: This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

characterabilities.name: Elite Cadre [Daughters of the Flame] [Resistance: Blast]
characterabilities.description: Friendly Daughters of the Flame models gain Resistance: Blast.

characterabilities.name: Rapid Strike
characterabilities.description: This model can make one additional melee attack each Combat Action.

characterabilities.name: Sprint
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it destroyed or removed from play one or more enemy models with melee attacks, this model can immediately make a full advance, then it's activation ends.

ability.name: Critical Decapitation
ability.description: On a critical hit, double the damage exceeding the ARM of the model hit. A model disabled by this attack cannot make a Tough roll.

characterabilities.name: Shield Guard
characterabilities.description: When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have this model directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.

characterabilities.name: Stone-and-Mortar Stance
characterabilities.description: During its activation, this model can forfeit its Normal Movement or Combat Action to gain +5 ARM. The affected model cannot become knocked down. Stone-and-Mortar Stance lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Impenetrable Shield
characterabilities.description: While this model is B2B with one or more friendly Temple Flameguard models, it does not suffer damage from non-magical melee or ranged attacks.

characterabilities.name: Leadership [Temple Flameguard] [Rapid Strike]
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, friendly faction Temple Flameguard models gain Rapid Strike. (A model with Rapid Strike can make one additional melee attack each Combat Action.)

characterabilities.name: Rapid Strike
characterabilities.description: This model can make one additional melee attack each Combat Action.

characterabilities.name: Relentless Charge
characterabilities.description: While advancing as part of a charge, this model gains Pathfinder.

characterabilities.name: Set Defense
characterabilities.description: A model in this model's front arc suffers -2 on charge, slam power attack, and impact attack accuracy rolls against this model.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Unyielding
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 ARM against melee damage rolls.

characterabilities.name: Ashen Veil
characterabilities.description: This model has concealment. Living enemy models without Resistance: Fire suffer -2 to attack accuracy rolls while within 2" of this model.

characterabilities.name: Drive: Blessing of Iron
characterabilities.description: While in this models command range, a warjack under its Control cannot be targeted by enemy spells and does not suffer the effects of crippled systems.

characterabilities.name: Soul Taker [3 Tokens]
characterabilities.description: This model can gain soul tokens. This model can carry up to 3 soul tokens at any time.

topability.name: Gatekeeper
topability.description: This model gains soul tokens from living friendly Faction models that are destroyed while in this model's CMD range. This model can spend soul tokens for the following:

subabilities.name: Ashes of Urcaen
subabilities.description: RNG 3”. Target friendly Faction model. If the model is in range, it gains Ashen Veil. Ashes of Urcaen lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: Glimpse of Fate
subabilities.description: RNG 3”. Target friendly Faction model. If the model is in range, it gains Future Sight. Glimpse of Fate lasts for one turn. (A model with Future Sight can boost accuracy and damage rolls after rolling.)

subabilities.name: Obscuring Haze
subabilities.description: Center a 3” AOE cloud effect on this model. The AOE remains centered on this model for one round. If this model is destroyed or removed from play, remove the AOE from play.

subabilities.description: This model can use this miracle once per turn, at any time during its activation. This model's Divine Wrath becomes ROF 2 and gains +4 RNG.

subabilities.description: This model can use this miracle once per turn at any time during its activation. For one round, friendly Faction warrior models within this model's command range gain Mage Static.

ability.name: Admonisher
ability.description: When an enemy model is directly hit by an attack with this weapon, the d3 nearest enemy models within 4" of the model hit suffer an unboostable POW 10 Arcane Damage roll. These damage rolls are not considered to not have caused by an attack. Damage rolls resulting from Admonisher are simultaneous.

characterabilities.description: While B2B with a friendly Faction warjack, this model gains +2 DEF and ARM and has Steady. (A model with Steady cannot become knocked down.)

Enliven lasts for one round.

characterabilities.description: This model cannot run, aim, charge, or become knocked down. This model can advance up to 12” total during its Normal Movement. If this model advances less than 12” during its Normal Movement, it can advance its remaining movement at the end of its activation.

characterabilities.name: Shooting Gallery
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 to Ranged accuracy rolls against models within 5” of it.

ability.name: Crater
ability.description: On a direct hit, models hit suffer -2 SPD for one round.

ability.name: Critical Devastation
ability.description: On a critical hit, models hit are thrown d6" directly away from the attacker. Roll distance once for all models affected. Move models farthest from the attacker first. Instead of suffering blast damage, models hit but not directly hit suffer a damage roll with POW of collateral damage is equal to the blast damage POW of this weapon.

ability.name: Siege Weapon
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die to its damage rolls against huge-based models and structures.

ability.name: Sky-Dropped
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon ignore cover. Models with Flight do not suffer blast damage from this attack.

characterabilities.name: Auto-Repair
characterabilities.description: During your Control Phase, remove d3 damage points from this model.

characterabilities.name: Evasive
characterabilities.description: When this model is hit by an enemy ranged attack, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can advance up to 2".

characterabilities.name: Flying High
characterabilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

characterabilities.name: Sky Ladder
characterabilities.description: When this model ends it's Normal Movement, choose one small or medium-based friendly solo model within 2” of it. You can place the chosen model completely within 2” of its current location. A model can be placed as a result of Sky Ladder only once per turn.

ability.name: Critical Knockdown
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Bottom Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The lower level of this structure is considered to be concealing terrain.

characterabilities.name: Catastrophic Collapse
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed or removed from play, all models inside of it immediately suffer 10 damage. This damage is simultaneous and not considered to have resulted from an attack. Replace this model with all surviving models that were inside of it when it was destroyed.

characterabilities.name: Forward Deployment
characterabilities.description: This model can be deployed up to 8” beyond your deployment zone.

characterabilities.name: Habitable [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Small and medium-based units and solos can enter this structure through a door on the lower level. A model/unit ending its Normal Movement within 1” of the door can choose to enter this building. Models entering this building can be placed on either the lower or upper levels. Models in a unit occupying this structure can be placed on either floor or both. There can be up to six small-based models or three medium-based models on each floor. There must be room for a model's base for it to be placed on either floor.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [any army]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for any army.

characterabilities.name: Movement Inside [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Models/units can use their Normal Movement to be placed on the top floor if they were previously on the lower floor or to be placed on the lower floor if they were on the top floor. Units using their Normal Movement to be placed are considered to have moved. Models cannot otherwise move, warp, or be placed while inside the building.

characterabilities.name: Top Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The upper level of this structure is considered to be elevated terrain. Additionally, models on the Top Floor gain Snipe. Spells cast from the Top Floor gain +4 RNG.
